cab.content: ,P.8307,C A P. I N F T,ARKFNIA.copy of telegram from the Governor General of NowZealand to the Secretary of State for the Coloni.ee, Dated 8th December 1920(Previous Pancrs0.P.2198; C.P.2226jCP, 2306).CP.2227 and Your telegram 27th November. Your telegram3rd December, Government of New Zealand will acquiesce in any decision arrived at by His Majesty's Governmentwith regard to resolution adopted by Assembly of Leagueof nations in connection with Armenia. JFLLICOE,j Jbitehall Gardens, S 'C December 16th 1920.
